member.name: GROUP_REQ
member.summary: The GROUP_REQ structure provides multicast group information for IPv6 or IPv4 addresses.

member.name: GROUP_REQ.gr_interface
member.summary: The interface index of the local interface on which the multicast group should be joined or dropped.

member.name: GROUP_REQ.gr_group
member.summary: The address of the multicast group. This may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address.
